short_description: A realistic 3D cross-section of a female breast, rendered with a medical-neutral color palette for educational purposes. The image prominently features a Stage I tumor, approximately 28mm in size, located within the upper outer quadrant. The overall presentation is clean and clinical, designed for clear anatomical and pathological visualization.

objects.description: The internal structure of a female breast, depicted in cross-section. It shows various tissues including glandular tissue, adipose tissue, and ducts, all rendered with accurate anatomical detail. The tissues are subtly differentiated by color and texture to highlight their distinct roles.
objects.relationship: The primary subject of the image, providing the anatomical context for the tumor.
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular, organic shape characteristic of breast anatomy, rendered in medical-neutral tones (creams, muted pinks, off-whites, and faint yellows) to distinguish tissue types.
objects.texture: Smooth, with subtle variations to represent different tissue densities.
objects.appearance_details: Highly detailed internal anatomy, showing ducts, lobules, and connective tissue. The cross-section reveals the layered nature of the breast.
objects.orientation: facing forward, as if a sagittal or coronal slice through the breast.

objects.description: A Stage I malignant tumor, approximately 28mm in diameter, embedded within the breast tissue. It is clearly demarcated from the surrounding healthy tissue but shows subtle signs of irregular margins, consistent with early-stage malignancy. Its size and location are precisely depicted.
objects.location: upper-outer quadrant of the breast cross-section
objects.relationship: Located within the breast tissue, it is the focal point of the educational visualization, highlighting a specific pathological condition.
objects.relative_size: medium within frame (relative to the breast)
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular, somewhat nodular shape, rendered in a slightly darker, more opaque medical-neutral tone (e.g., a muted grey or slightly purplish hue) compared to healthy tissue, indicating abnormal density.
objects.texture: Slightly granular or heterogeneous texture, distinct from the smoother surrounding healthy tissue.
objects.appearance_details: Subtle vascularization might be visible around the tumor, indicating its metabolic activity. The margins are defined but not perfectly smooth, suggesting early invasive characteristics.
objects.orientation: Embedded within the tissue structure, conforming to its surroundings.

background_setting: A clean, pure white background, providing maximum contrast and ensuring the anatomical details are the sole focus without any distractions.

lighting.conditions: Soft, diffused clinical lighting, designed to illuminate the anatomical structures evenly without harsh glare.
lighting.direction: Evenly lit from multiple angles, simulating standard medical visualization lighting.
lighting.shadows: Minimal, very soft, and almost imperceptible shadows, primarily used to enhance the 3D depth and separation of tissues rather than create dramatic effect.

aesthetics.composition: Centered, orthographic view of the cross-section, ensuring all parts of the breast and tumor are clearly visible and proportionally represented. The field of view is tightly cropped to the anatomy.
aesthetics.color_scheme: Medical-neutral palette (e.g., creams, muted pinks, soft greys, faint yellows, and subtle purplish tones for pathology), emphasizing clarity and distinction of structures.
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: Informative, sterile, precise, and educational, devoid of any emotional or artistic interpretation beyond scientific accuracy.

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: Deep, ensuring all anatomical details from foreground to background within the cross-section are in sharp focus.
photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp focus throughout the entire cross-section, with particular emphasis on the tumor and surrounding tissue interfaces.
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: Orthographic view, providing a flat, non-perspective representation ideal for precise measurement and anatomical study.
photographic_characteristics.lens_focal_length: Equivalent to a macro lens, allowing for extreme detail and close-up examination of the tissue structures without distortion.

context: This is a highly realistic 3D rendered visualization for medical education, specifically designed to illustrate the internal anatomy of a female breast with a Stage I tumor for diagnostic and pathological study.
